title: Complex transcriptome network regulates the anthocyanin accumulation of fourPanax ginsengcultivars in fruit.
abstract: Panax ginsengfruit tissue is one of the richest sources of valuable constituents such as ginsenosides and anthocyanins. Although anthocyanins extracted from the fruit tissue ofP. ginsengare utilized, it is uncertain how anthocyanin accumulation is regulated and which anthocyanin varieties are synthesized.
